request.description:
Resends the callback for a payout to your configured callback URL. The payout must have reached a final state.

Please ensure your implementation of callback handling follows the guidelines in [Handling callbacks](#section/Implementation/Handling-callbacks).

exec: // This code runs in the "Tests" tab (Post-response)
// Test 1: Check if the HTTP status code is 200 (OK) or 201 (Created)
pm.test("Status code is successful (200 or 201)", function () {
// Test 2: Check if the response body contains the "status": "ACCEPTED"
// Now, if the tests pass, let's capture the variable
// Store the depositId in a collection variable
console.log("Captured depositId and saved to variable:", responseData.depositId);
console.error("Could not find depositId in the response.");
